ITEMS.itemTitle:
*.data from order_title, .menu_overlay_quantity, .menu_product_drink (checkes to see if any child input is checked or not if yes copy the label name which would be in a p tag inside the label),
        .swallow_menu_options ( checkes to see if any child  input is checked or not if yes copy the label name which would be in a p tag inside the label),
        .special instructions-{special_instructions_input(innertext from this class },*
ITEMS.total_price: integer gotten from the textcontent of this .overlay_total_price_text

itemsQuantity: no of items in the 'ITEMS' object above
total: sum of all the 'total_price' in each items in 'ITEMS'
